connect20/nfusionsolutions_currencyexcha.name: connect20/Nfusionsolutions_CurrencyExchangeRates

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/nfusionsolutions_currencyexcha.description: This extension adds the capability in Magento to import currency conversion rates from nFusion Solutions' reliable, enterprise-class cloud platform for global currency data.
